tool_description: World cup football history with data and stats.
name: World Cup football
title: World Cup football

api_list.name: Get winner by   most wins.
api_list.description:
Get winner by   most wins.
Get a Country with most world cup wins.
Brazil:
Example :
www.football-api.uk/api/[API-KEY ]/allWiners/mostWins/1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cup-football2.p.rapidapi.com/allWiners/mostWins/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cup-football2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cup-football2.p.rapidapi.com/allWiners/mostWins/{numvar}"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get winner by Country name .
api_list.description:
Get winner by team name .
Type the name of Country, you will get all Country stats and data.
